definitions: A person who engages in swinging, which is the practice of engaging in sexual activities with multiple partners.
A person with an uninhibited or free-spirited lifestyle, often associated with the 1960s and 1970s.
A person competent or skilled in swinging a bat or club, as in golf or baseball.
examples: The professional golfer was an exceptional swinger.
A well-known swinger of the jazz age.
